name: KAT fm
description:
KAT-FM Radio has an important message for you! Unfortunately for them, their whole station is completely down! Play as the employees of KAT-FM as they fight off office cats, climb the radio tower, and venture through space, all to get you their message; in this vertical platformer, KAT-FM!

A game released in Global Game Jam 2018 https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/kat-fm

Austin Dulong - Level Designer, Sound Designer

Ryley "Birdboy" Forwood - Concept Artist, Asset Creator

Nolan Harris - Level Designer, Asset Creator, Character Designer, Translator

Daimee "The Chosen One" MacIsaac - Lead Programmer

Vadim Mayorskiy - Asset Creator, Level Designer, Translator

Danielle Solomon - Character Artist/Designer

Troy Zaher - Producer, Project Manager, Concept Designer
